TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lavulan, title = Lavulan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lavulan} }

S.FORM: Lavulan Itiniay i Taoyuan Cen no Kaohsiung ko Lavulan a niyaro', 81 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 222 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 219 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 96%, Tayal 0.5%, Rukai 0.5%, Puyuma 0.5%, Paiwan 0.5%, roma 0.5%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Lavolan Itiniay i Taoyoan Cen no Kaohsiong ko Lavolan a niyaro', 81 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 222 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 219 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 96%, Tayal 0.5%, Rokai 0.5%, Poyoma 0.5%, Paiwan 0.5%, roma 0.5%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
